They then shift their focus to finalizing the menu for the upcoming event. @ <persona> Isabella Rodriguez
chat: Isabella, what's your favorite party memory? I bet you have some great stories to share!
Oh, Pepper, there was this one time at a New Year's Eve party where we had a surprise fireworks display! It was magical.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I can only imagine how spectacular it must have been. Thanks for sharing, Isabella.
Of course, Pepper. It's always fun to reminisce about past celebrations while preparing for new ones. Now, let's finalize this menu for the Valentine's Day party!
